text: @kylewalker2 You’ve literally hosted a sex party, keys in a bowl style, got found out then spat the dummy drove from Manchester to Sheffield for a family birthday then swung by another family household for some dinners to tide you over. All during Covid-19 lockdown restrictions. Not ideal.
